SummarizeResultPrompt - QUERY:

# Instructions
In order to find evidence that helps your fact-check, you just ran a web search which yielded a Search Result. **Your task right now is to summarize the Search Result.** What to include:
* information that might be useful for the fact-check (see Record)
* relevant images (refer to images by inserting their reference <image:k>)
* if available: the release date as well as the author or the publisher (e.g. the media company) of the search result.

Do NOT include:
* advertisements
* any other information not related to the Record or the Claim

Additional rules:
* Do not add any additional information besides the information in the Search Result.
* If the Search Result doesn't contain any relevant information for the fact-checking work, simply print one word in capital letters: "NONE".
* Keep your writing style like in the Examples 1, 2 and 3 provided to you.
* Try to filter out relevant information even if the search result is in a different language.

# Example 1
The search result from America Today provides several photographs of the Notre-Dame Cathedral fire on April 15, 2019. <image:i>, <image:j>, <image:k>. None of the images show the Eiffel Tower in the background. 

# Example 2
NONE

# Example 3
The Guardian discusses a report blaming the Syrian government for a toxic gas attack and condemning their use of chemical weapons. The Guardian mentions the Chemical Weapons Convention and the responsibilities of Syria under the convention. According to The Guardian, The White House condemned the Assad regime for defying the norm against chemical weapons use.

# Record
## Claim
Claim: "<image:48> This is an authentic image of Israeli Air Force's Ramat David airbase that was attacked by Hezbollah on September, 22, 2024."

## Actions
```
geolocate(<image:48>)
web_search("Ramat David airbase attack September 22 2024")
image_search("Ramat David airbase fire")
```

# Search Result
From [Source](https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2024/9/21/hezbollah-claims-rocket-attack-deep-inside-northern-israel): 
Content: "![An excavator removes a charred car in Kiryat Bialik in the Haifa district of Israel following a Hezbollah attack](/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/AFP__20240922__36GW3NF__v1__HighRes__IsraelLebanonPalestinianConflict-1726990173.jpg?resize=770%2C513&quality=80)

An excavator removes a charred car in Kiryat Bialik in the Haifa district of Israel following a Hezbollah attack \[Jack Guez/AFP\]

By [Al Jazeera Staff](/author/al_jazeera_staff_150119130629458)

Published On 21 Sep 202421 Sep 2024

Hezbollah has announced that it launched dozens of rockets at Israel’s Ramat David Airbase, east of Haifa, in response to a series of [Israeli attacks](/news/2024/9/19/lebanese-people-talk-about-fears-after-pager-and-walkie-talkie-explosions)
, prompting the UN to war of an “imminent catastrophe” if the tit-for-tat violence continues.

Sirens were activated across northern Israel in the early hours of Sunday.

Recommended Stories
-------------------

list of 3 items

list 1 of 3

### [At least 45 killed in Israeli strike on suburb in Lebanon’s Beirut](/news/2024/9/21/death-toll-from-israeli-strike-on-beirut-suburb-rises-to-31)

list 2 of 3

### [Israeli attack on Gaza school sheltering displaced Palestinians kills 22](/news/2024/9/21/several-killed-in-israeli-attack-on-gaza-school-sheltering-displaced-palestinians)

list 3 of 3

### [Israeli explosion rocks Beirut, crossing red line for Hezbollah](/video/inside-story/2024/9/21/israeli-explosion-rocks-beirut-crossing-another-red-line-for-hezbollah)

end of list

If confirmed, the assault would be Hezbollah’s farthest-reaching attack inside Israel since the start of the ongoing cross-border clashes in October last year.

The Israeli military said more than 100 projectiles were fired early on Sunday from Lebanon, forcing hundreds of thousands to take cover and prompting school closures in Israel’s north.

Educational activities would not be permitted across northern Israel until at least Monday at 6pm (15:00 GMT), the military’s Home Front Command said, affecting “hundreds of thousands of children”, according to military spokesman Lieutenant Colonel Nadav Shoshani.

“In Haifa, a lot of schools are closed … and offices are empty,” said resident Patrice Wolff, who works in the medical industry.

The Israeli military also issued restrictions on large gatherings in northern Israel, including Haifa – the country’s third-largest city.

There were no reports of casualties or any significant damage by rockets in Israel on Sunday.

On Saturday, the Israeli army said it carried out hundreds of air raids across southern Lebanon. It also claimed attacks on 110 other locations in the early hours of Sunday morning.

In a statement issued by his office on Sunday, Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu acknowledged that Israel “inflicted a series of blows” against Hezbollah.

“If Hezbollah has not understood the message, I promise you, it will understand the message.”

Meanwhile, Israeli Defence Minister Yoav Gallant vowed that Israeli operations against Hezbollah will continue until residents of northern Israel can return home safely.

‘Imminent catastrophe’
----------------------

The latest violence could lead to an “imminent catastrophe” in the Middle East, the United Nations special coordinator for Lebanon, Jeanine Hennis-Plasschaert, warned on Sunday, saying a military solution was not the answer.

“With the region on the brink of an imminent catastrophe, it cannot be overstated enough: there is NO military solution that will make either side safer,” she said in a post on X.

Reporting from Beirut, Al Jazeera’s Ali Hashem also highlighted the significance of the Lebanese group’s attack.

“This is the first time since the 2006 war \[between Israel and Hezbollah\] that Hezbollah’s missiles crossed” 20km (12 miles), Hashem said.

“This is the first time that they’re hitting targets towards 45km \[30 miles\], 50km \[31 miles\], because we’re hearing reports of impacts or interceptions in several areas, including above the Ramat David Airbase to the east of Haifa.”

Al Jazeera’s Zeina Khodr, also reporting from Beirut, said Hezbollah’s message is that despite the blows that they have received in the past few days, “it’s still able to fight and launch rockets and missiles across the border”.

In its statement, Hezbollah said it carried out the attack with so-called Fadi 1 and Fadi 2 rockets, not the World War II era, Soviet-made Katyusha rockets that it has been using over the past several months.

The latest barrage of rocket fire comes after a week of Israeli attacks across Lebanon.

On Tuesday and Wednesday, wireless [communication devices](/news/2024/9/18/chk_exploding-pagers-psychological-warfare-israels-attack-on-hezbollah)
 associated with Hezbollah exploded across Lebanon, injuring thousands and killing dozens, including civilians. Hezbollah has said it is not seeking an all-out war, but it is ready for one should it occur.

Israeli leaders have promised to push Hezbollah off Israel’s border and return its citizens to communities in the north, including through war if necessary.

![Security forces investigate around a damaged car in Kiryat Bialik in the Haifa district of Israel, following a reported strike by Lebanon's Hezbollah on September 22, 2024. Hezbollah said on September 22 that it targeted military production facilities and an air base near north Israel's Haifa after the Israeli military pounded south Lebanon and said it targeted thousands of rocket launcher barrels.(Photo by Jack GUEZ / AFP) Related content Photos israel - lebanon - palestinian - conflict israel - lebanon - palestinian - conflict israel - lebanon - palestinian - conflict israel - lebanon - palestinian - conflict israel - lebanon - palestinian - conflict israel - lebanon - palestinian - conflict israel - lebanon - palestinian - conflict israel - lebanon - palestinian - conflict israel - lebanon - palestinian - conflict israel - lebanon - palestinian - conflict israel - lebanon - palestinian - conflict israel - lebanon - palestinian - conflict israel - lebanon - palestinian - conflict israel - lebanon - palestinian - conflict israel - lebanon - palestinian - conflict First responders and Israeli security forces gather amid debris and charred vehicles in Kiryat Bialik in the Haifa district of Israel, following a reported strike by Lebanon's Hezbollah on September 22, 2024. Lebanon blamed the unprecedented attack on Israel.

Death toll in Beirut strike rises
---------------------------------

Israel also conducted an air strike in the southern suburbs of Beirut on Friday that [killed at least 45 people](/news/2024/9/21/death-toll-from-israeli-strike-on-beirut-suburb-rises-to-31)
 and injured dozens more.

Senior Hezbollah commander Ibrahim Aqil was among those killed in the attack that levelled an entire residential building.

Hezbollah and Israel have engaged in daily clashes since the outbreak of the Israeli war on Gaza.

The Lebanese group says it will continue its attacks on Israeli bases in the north of the country until Israel ends its Gaza offensive.

The violence has displaced tens of thousands of people on both sides of the border.

The two sides appear to be in an escalatory spiral, risking a serious conflict. israel - lebanon - palestinian - conflict israel - lebanon - palestinian - conflict israel - lebanon - palestinian - conflict israel - SummarizeResultPrompt - QUERY:

# Instructions
In order to find evidence that helps your fact-check, you just ran a web search which yielded a Search Result. **Your task right now is to summarize the Search Result.** What to include:
* information that might be useful for the fact-check (see Record)
* relevant images (refer to images by inserting their reference <image:k>)
* if available: the release date as well as the author or the publisher (e.g. the media company) of the search result.

Do NOT include:
* advertisements
* any other information not related to the Record or the Claim

Additional rules:
* Do not add any additional information besides the information in the Search Result.
* If the Search Result doesn't contain any relevant information for the fact-checking work, simply print one word in capital letters: "NONE".
* Keep your writing style like in the Examples 1, 2 and 3 provided to you.
* Try to filter out relevant information even if the search result is in a different language.

# Example 1
The search result from America Today provides several photographs of the Notre-Dame Cathedral fire on April 15, 2019. <image:i>, <image:j>, <image:k>. None of the images show the Eiffel Tower in the background. 

# Example 2
NONE

# Example 3
The Guardian discusses a report blaming the Syrian government for a toxic gas attack and condemning their use of chemical weapons. The Guardian mentions the Chemical Weapons Convention and the responsibilities of Syria under the convention. According to The Guardian, The White House condemned the Assad regime for defying the norm against chemical weapons use.

# Search Result
From [Source](https://www.politico.eu/article/hezbollah-launches-revenge-rocket-attack-against-israeli-base/): 
Content: "[Skip to main content](#main)

Hezbollah launched dozens of rockets at an Israeli military base in the northern region of the country on Sunday, as Israel and the militant group continue to exchange fire amid escalating tensions in the Middle East.

The militant group said the attack, which targeted the Ramat David airbase, near the northern city of Haifa, was “in response to the [repeated Israeli attacks](https://www.politico.eu/article/senior-hezbollah-commander-killed-in-israeli-strike-on-beirut/)
 that targeted various Lebanese regions and led to the fall of many civilian martyrs," the Associated Press [reported](https://apnews.com/article/israel-hezbollah-rocket-attack-mideast-tensions-0584727974096d98d1b5b132dfd1d218)
.

"We have entered a new phase, the title of which is the [open-ended battle of reckoning](https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/hezbollah-israel-exchange-heavy-fire-after-deadly-israeli-strike-2024-09-22/)
," Hezbollah deputy chief Naim Qassem said on Sunday.

Israel Defense Forces [confirmed](https://x.com/IDF/status/1837680273405702296)
 on social media that "large areas of northern Israel are being targeted by Hezbollah’s rockets." It was unclear whether there were any casualties.

The attack came after a massive Israeli air strike on the Lebanese capital Beirut [killed](https://www.politico.eu/article/senior-hezbollah-commander-killed-in-israeli-strike-on-beirut/)
 at least 37 people on Friday, including a top Hezbollah military commander.

These missile and rockets exchanges are just [the latest escalations](https://www.politico.com/news/2024/09/20/israel-hezbollah-escalation-00180299)
 in the conflict between Israel and Hezbollah militants, which are fanning fears of a wider war in the region. Israel earlier [said](https://x.com/IDF/status/1837501170182483984)
 it launched a series of airstrikes targeting Hezbollah missile launchers in southern Lebanon.

"In recent days, we have inflicted a [series of blows](https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/netanyahu-examining-siege-plan-hamas-north-gaza-israeli-media-report-2024-09-22/)
 on Hezbollah that it never imagined," Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said in a [video statement](https://x.com/netanyahu/status/1837815933340971071)
 on Sunday. "If Hezbollah has not understood the message, I promise you, it will [understand the message](https://www.timesofisrael.com/netanyahu-says-hezbollah-will-get-the-message-after-strikes-it-never-imagined/)
."

Hezbollah last week [blamed](https://www.politico.eu/article/lebanon-hezbollah-injured-by-exploding-pagers/)
 Israel for two waves of attacks where the explosion of [pagers](https://www.politico.eu/article/lebanon-hezbollah-injured-by-exploding-pagers/)
 and other [communications devices](https://www.politico.eu/article/lebanon-second-wave-tech-pager-explosions-beirut-nabatieh-tyre-saida/)
 used by Hezbollah members killed dozens of people and injured thousands more."

# Your Summary



===== > RESPONSE:  < =====
Politico.eu reports that Hezbollah launched rockets at the Ramat David airbase on Sunday, September 22, 2024. The attack was in response to Israeli attacks on Lebanon.

===== > RESPONSE:  < =====
Hezbollah claimed to have launched rockets at Israel’s Ramat David Airbase on September 22, 2024, according to Al Jazeera ([https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2024/9/21/hezbollah-claims-rocket-attack-deep-inside-northern-israel](https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2024/9/21/hezbollah-claims-rocket-attack-deep-inside-northern-israel)). Politico.eu also reported on the attack ([https://www.politico.eu/article/hezbollah-launches-revenge-rocket-attack-against-israeli-base/](https://www.politico.eu/article/hezbollah-launches-revenge-rocket-attack-against-israeli-base/)).

The Jerusalem Post also discussed Hezbollah's rocket attacks on Ramat David airbase ([https://www.jpost.com/israel-news/article-821267](https://www.jpost.com/israel-news/article-821267)). The Al Jazeera article includes images of damage in Kiryat Bialik, Israel, following a Hezbollah attack <image:i>. The Jerusalem Post article includes an image of Israeli air force technicians working on a F-16 Fighting Falcon in Ramat David Airbase <image:592369>.

From [Source](https://defapress.ir/en/news/85030/hezbollah-targeted-ramat-david-airbase-with-several-missiles): 
Content: The source reports that Hezbollah targeted Ramat David airbase with several missiles. <image:5620>


From [Source](https://www.palestinechronicle.com/gaza-live-blog-beirut-death-toll-rises-strike-in-zaytoun-israels-aggression-on-lebanon-continues-day-351/): 
Content: The Palestine Chronicle published an image of a fire. <image:5621>


From [Source](https://parstoday.ir/en/news/west_asia-i230538-huge_blasts_in_ramat_david_airbase_of_israel_five_important_points_about_hezbollah's_broad_attack): 
Content: The source discusses huge blasts in Ramat David airbase of Israel. <image:5622>


## Your Summary



===== > RESPONSE:  < =====
The web sources report on an attack on Ramat David airbase. One source states that Hezbollah targeted the airbase with missiles (<image:5620>). Another source published an image of a fire (<image:5621>). A third source discusses huge blasts in the airbase (<image:5622>).

The sources are: [https://defapress.ir/en/news/85030/hezbollah-targeted-ramat-david-airbase-with-several-missiles](https://defapress.ir/en/news/85030/hezbollah-targeted-ramat-david-airbase-with-several-missiles), [https://www.palestinechronicle.com/gaza-live-blog-beirut-death-toll-rises-strike-in-zaytoun-israels-aggression-on-lebanon-continues-day-351/](https://www.palestinechronicle.com/gaza-live-blog-beirut-death-toll-rises-strike-in-zaytoun-israels-aggression-on-lebanon-continues-day-351/) and [https://parstoday.ir/en/news/west_asia-i230538-huge_blasts_in_ramat_david_airbase_of_israel_five_important_points_about_hezbollah's_broad_attack](https://parstoday.ir/en/news/west_asia-i230538-huge_blasts_in_ramat_david_airbase_of_israel_five_important_points_about_hezbollah's_broad_attack).

DevelopPrompt - QUERY:

# Instructions
You just retrieved new Evidence. Now, **analyze the Claim's veracity using the evidence**. Always adhere to the following rules:
* Focus on developing new insights. Do not repeat larger parts from the Record. Do not restate the Claim.
* Write down your thoughts step-by-step. Whenever necessary, you may elaborate in more detail.
* Depending on the topic's complexity, invest one to three paragraphs. The fewer, the better.
* If you find that there is insufficient information to verify the Claim, explicitly state what information is missing.
* If you cite web sources, always refer to them by including their URL as a Markdown hyperlink.
* **Use information only from the recorded evidence**: Avoid inserting information that is not implied by the evidence. You may use commonsense knowledge, though.

# Record
## Claim
Claim: "<image:48> This is an authentic image of Israeli Air Force's Ramat David airbase that was attacked by Hezbollah on September, 22, 2024."

## Actions
```
geolocate(<image:48>)
web_search("Ramat David airbase attack September 22 2024")
image_search("Ramat David airbase fire")
```

## Evidence
### Evidence from `geolocate`
The most likely countries where the image was taken are: {'South Korea': 0.88, 'Bulgaria': 0.01, 'Chile': 0.01, 'Czech Republic': 0.01, 'Israel': 0.01, 'Russia': 0.01, 'Taiwan': 0.01, 'Turkey': 0.01, 'Ukraine': 0.01, 'Albania': 0.0}

### Evidence from `web_search`
Hezbollah claimed to have launched rockets at Israel’s Ramat David Airbase on September 22, 2024, according to Al Jazeera ([https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2024/9/21/hezbollah-claims-rocket-attack-deep-inside-northern-israel](https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2024/9/21/hezbollah-claims-rocket-attack-deep-inside-northern-israel)). Politico.eu also reported on the attack ([https://www.politico.eu/article/hezbollah-launches-revenge-rocket-attack-against-israeli-base/](https://www.politico.eu/article/hezbollah-launches-revenge-rocket-attack-against-israeli-base/)).

The Jerusalem Post also discussed Hezbollah's rocket attacks on Ramat David airbase ([https://www.jpost.com/israel-news/article-821267](https://www.jpost.com/israel-news/article-821267)). The Al Jazeera article includes images of damage in Kiryat Bialik, Israel, following a Hezbollah attack <image:i>. The Jerusalem Post article includes an image of Israeli air force technicians working on a F-16 Fighting Falcon in Ramat David Airbase <image:592369>.


### Evidence from `image_search`
The web sources report on an attack on Ramat David airbase. One source states that Hezbollah targeted the airbase with missiles (<image:5620>). Another source published an image of a fire (<image:5621>). A third source discusses huge blasts in the airbase (<image:5622>).

The sources are: [https://defapress.ir/en/news/85030/hezbollah-targeted-ramat-david-airbase-with-several-missiles](https://defapress.ir/en/news/85030/hezbollah-targeted-ramat-david-airbase-with-several-missiles), [https://www.palestinechronicle.com/gaza-live-blog-beirut-death-toll-rises-strike-in-zaytoun-israels-aggression-on-lebanon-continues-day-351/](https://www.palestinechronicle.com/gaza-live-blog-beirut-death-toll-rises-strike-in-zaytoun-israels-aggression-on-lebanon-continues-day-351/) and [https://parstoday.ir/en/news/west_asia-i230538-huge_blasts_in_ramat_david_airbase_of_israel_five_important_points_about_hezbollah's_broad_attack](https://parstoday.ir/en/news/west_asia-i230538-huge_blasts_in_ramat_david_airbase_of_israel_five_important_points_about_hezbollah's_broad_attack).


# Your Analysis



===== > RESPONSE:  < =====
The evidence confirms that Hezbollah launched an attack on Ramat David Airbase on September 22, 2024. The image search results show images of fire and blasts at the airbase. However, the geolocation of the image in the claim suggests it was taken in South Korea, not Israel.

Therefore, the claim is likely false. The image may depict a different event or be digitally altered. Further investigation is needed to confirm the image's authenticity and origin.

JudgePrompt - QUERY:

# Instructions
**Determine the Claim's veracity** by following these steps:
1. Briefly summarize the key insights from the fact-check (see Record) in at most one paragraph.
2. Write one paragraph about which one of the Decision Options applies best. Include the most appropriate decision option at the end and enclose it in backticks like `this`.




## Decision Options
* `not enough information`: The fact-check does not contain sufficient information to come to an conclusion. For example,there is substantial lack of evidence or the evidence is inconclusive, conflicting or self-contradictory. In the case of a lack of evidence, state which information exactly is missing. In particular, if no RESULTS or sources are available, pick this decision.
* `false`: The claim is not factually accurate. This is the case if one of the following three conditions is met:(1) The claim is demonstrably false when it is disproven by evidence from multiple and reliable sources,(2) The claim or image is taken out of context, i.e. the origin, content and/or meaning of a statement or an image is misrepresented. For example, an old claim or an old image is mispresented in a new context in a misleading way,(3) There is not enough evidence to verify the claim or the evidence is conflicting or self-contradictory.
* `true`: The claim is factually accurate when it is confirmed by evidence from multiple and reliable sources.

## Claim

### Evidence from `web_search`
Hezbollah claimed to have launched rockets at Israel’s Ramat David Airbase on September 22, 2024, according to Al Jazeera ([https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2024/9/21/hezbollah-claims-rocket-attack-deep-inside-northern-israel](https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2024/9/21/hezbollah-claims-rocket-attack-deep-inside-northern-israel)). Politico.eu also reported on the attack ([https://www.politico.eu/article/hezbollah-launches-revenge-rocket-attack-against-israeli-base/](https://www.politico.eu/article/hezbollah-launches-revenge-rocket-attack-against-israeli-base/)).

The Jerusalem Post also discussed Hezbollah's rocket attacks on Ramat David airbase ([https://www.jpost.com/israel-news/article-821267](https://www.jpost.com/israel-news/article-821267)). The Al Jazeera article includes images of damage in Kiryat Bialik, Israel, following a Hezbollah attack <image:i>. The Jerusalem Post article includes an image of Israeli air force technicians working on a F-16 Fighting Falcon in Ramat David Airbase <image:592369>.

The web sources report on an attack on Ramat David airbase. One source states that Hezbollah targeted the airbase with missiles (<image:5620>). Another source published an image of a fire (<image:5621>). A third source discusses huge blasts in the airbase (<image:5622>).

The sources are: [https://defapress.ir/en/news/85030/hezbollah-targeted-ramat-david-airbase-with-several-missiles](https://defapress.ir/en/news/85030/hezbollah-targeted-ramat-david-airbase-with-several-missiles), [https://www.palestinechronicle.com/gaza-live-blog-beirut-death-toll-rises-strike-in-zaytoun-israels-aggression-on-lebanon-continues-day-351/](https://www.palestinechronicle.com/gaza-live-blog-beirut-death-toll-rises-strike-in-zaytoun-israels-aggression-on-lebanon-continues-day-351/) and [https://parstoday.ir/en/news/west_asia-i230538-huge_blasts_in_ramat_david_airbase_of_israel_five_important_points_about_hezbollah's_broad_attack](https://parstoday.ir/en/news/west_asia-i230538-huge_blasts_in_ramat_david_airbase_of_israel_five_important_points_about_hezbollah's_broad_attack).


## Elaboration
The evidence confirms that Hezbollah launched an attack on Ramat David Airbase on September 22, 2024. The image search results show images of fire and blasts at the airbase. However, the geolocation of the image in the claim suggests it was taken in South Korea, not Israel.

Therefore, the claim is likely false. The image may depict a different event or be digitally altered. Further investigation is needed to confirm the image's authenticity and origin.


# Your Judgement



===== > RESPONSE:  < =====
The provided evidence confirms that Hezbollah attacked Ramat David Airbase on September 22, 2024. However, the geolocation data suggests the image was taken in South Korea, not Israel. While the web search and image search results confirm the attack, they do not validate the authenticity of the specific image in the claim.

`false`

SummarizeDocPrompt - QUERY:

# Instructions
You are provided with the record of a fact-check. It contains the Claim to be verified and a documentation of all the fact-checking work along the gathered evidence. Your task is to **summarize the fact-check**. That is, you provide a concise, one-paragraph justification for the final VERDICT based on the knowledge from the Record. Note:
* Be truthful, brief, do not add any additional information besides the information given in the Record. 
* Link key sources in your summary. Use Markdown notation for that. You may link them in-line.
* Don't state the Claim again. Rather focus on the key insights of the fact-check.
* Simply print just the summary.

# Record
## Claim
Claim: "<image:48> This is an authentic image of Israeli Air Force's Ramat David airbase that was attacked by Hezbollah on September, 22, 2024."

## Actions
```
geolocate(<image:48>)
web_search("Ramat David airbase attack September 22 2024")
image_search("Ramat David airbase fire")
```

## Evidence
### Evidence from `geolocate`
The most likely countries where the image was taken are: {'South Korea': 0.88, 'Bulgaria': 0.01, 'Chile': 0.01, 'Czech Republic': 0.01, 'Israel': 0.01, 'Russia': 0.01, 'Taiwan': 0.01, 'Turkey': 0.01, 'Ukraine': 0.01, 'Albania': 0.0}

### Evidence from `web_search`
Hezbollah claimed to have launched rockets at Israel’s Ramat David Airbase on September 22, 2024, according to Al Jazeera ([https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2024/9/21/hezbollah-claims-rocket-attack-deep-inside-northern-israel](https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2024/9/21/hezbollah-claims-rocket-attack-deep-inside-northern-israel)). Politico.eu also reported on the attack ([https://www.politico.eu/article/hezbollah-launches-revenge-rocket-attack-against-israeli-base/](https://www.politico.eu/article/hezbollah-launches-revenge-rocket-attack-against-israeli-base/)).

The Jerusalem Post also discussed Hezbollah's rocket attacks on Ramat David airbase ([https://www.jpost.com/israel-news/article-821267](https://www.jpost.com/israel-news/article-821267)). The Al Jazeera article includes images of damage in Kiryat Bialik, Israel, following a Hezbollah attack <image:i>. The Jerusalem Post article includes an image of Israeli air force technicians working on a F-16 Fighting Falcon in Ramat David Airbase <image:592369>.


### Evidence from `image_search`
The web sources report on an attack on Ramat David airbase. One source states that Hezbollah targeted the airbase with missiles (<image:5620>). Another source published an image of a fire (<image:5621>). A third source discusses huge blasts in the airbase (<image:5622>).

The sources are: [https://defapress.ir/en/news/85030/hezbollah-targeted-ramat-david-airbase-with-several-missiles](https://defapress.ir/en/news/85030/hezbollah-targeted-ramat-david-airbase-with-several-missiles), [https://www.palestinechronicle.com/gaza-live-blog-beirut-death-toll-rises-strike-in-zaytoun-israels-aggression-on-lebanon-continues-day-351/](https://www.palestinechronicle.com/gaza-live-blog-beirut-death-toll-rises-strike-in-zaytoun-israels-aggression-on-lebanon-continues-day-351/) and [https://parstoday.ir/en/news/west_asia-i230538-huge_blasts_in_ramat_david_airbase_of_israel_five_important_points_about_hezbollah's_broad_attack](https://parstoday.ir/en/news/west_asia-i230538-huge_blasts_in_ramat_david_airbase_of_israel_five_important_points_about_hezbollah's_broad_attack).


## Elaboration
The evidence confirms that Hezbollah launched an attack on Ramat David Airbase on September 22, 2024. The image search results show images of fire and blasts at the airbase. However, the geolocation of the image in the claim suggests it was taken in South Korea, not Israel.

Therefore, the claim is likely false. The image may depict a different event or be digitally altered. Further investigation is needed to confirm the image's authenticity and origin.


## Final Judgement
The provided evidence confirms that Hezbollah attacked Ramat David Airbase on September 22, 2024. However, the geolocation data suggests the image was taken in South Korea, not Israel. While the web search and image search results confirm the attack, they do not validate the authenticity of the specific image in the claim.

`false`

## Summary



===== > RESPONSE:  < =====
The claim is likely false. While multiple sources ([Al Jazeera](https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2024/9/21/hezbollah-claims-rocket-attack-deep-inside-northern-israel), [Politico.eu](https://www.politico.eu/article/hezbollah-launches-revenge-rocket-attack-against-israeli-base/), and [The Jerusalem Post](https://www.jpost.com/israel-news/article-821267)) confirm the attack on Ramat David Airbase by Hezbollah on September 22, 2024, the geolocation of the image suggests it was taken in South Korea, not Israel.

PlanPrompt - QUERY:

# Instructions
The available knowledge is insufficient to assess the Claim. Therefore, **propose a set of actions** to retrieve new and helpful evidence. Adhere to the following rules:
* The actions available are listed under Valid Actions, including a short description for each action. No other actions are possible at this moment. 
* For each action, use the formatting as specified in Valid Actions.
* Include all actions in a single Markdown code block at the end of your answer.
* Propose as few actions as possible, but as much as needed. Do not propose similar or previously used actions.



## Valid Actions
* `geolocate`
   * Description: Performs geolocation to determine the country where an image was taken.
   * How to use: Provide an image and the model will determine the most likely countries where it was taken.
   * Format: geolocate(<image:k>), where `k` is the image's ID

* `web_search`
   * Description: Run an open web search on Google or DuckDuckGO to retrieve any related webpage.
   * How to use: Do not use this with a previously used or similar query from previous web searches. If a previous web search did not yield any results, use a very different query.
   * Format: web_search("your web search query goes here")

* `image_search`
   * Description: Run an image search on Google to retrieve related images for a given query.
   * How to use: This is a helpful tool for fact-checking images. Use this to retrieve images associated with a specific keyword or phrase. Ensure that the query is clear and specific to improve search accuracy. If no relevant images are found, refine the query or use more descriptive terms.
   * Format: image_search("your image search query goes here")

# Example: geolocate()

## Claim
Text: "<image:k> shows a nuclear weapons facility in Usbekistan."

...

## Actions
```
geolocate(<image:k>)
```

# Example: web_search()

## Claim
Text: "New Zealand’s new Food Bill bans gardening"
Claim date: October 29, 2020

...

## Actions
```
web_search("New Zealand Food Bill 2020")
web_search("New Zealand Food Bill gardening ban")
```

# Example: image_search()

## Claim
Text: "Chinese officials in white protective hazmat suits carried people down a hallway to be quarantined for having COVID-19 in November 2022."

...

ACTIONS:
```
image_search("China officials white suits carry people")
image_search("China officials carry people COVID quarantine 2022")
```

SummarizeResultPrompt - QUERY:

# Instructions
In order to find evidence that helps your fact-check, you just ran a web search which yielded a Search Result. **Your task right now is to summarize the Search Result.** What to include:
* information that might be useful for the fact-check (see Record)
* relevant images (refer to images by inserting their reference <image:k>)
* if available: the release date as well as the author or the publisher (e.g. the media company) of the search result.

Do NOT include:
* advertisements
* any other information not related to the Record or the Claim

Additional rules:
* Do not add any additional information besides the information in the Search Result.
* If the Search Result doesn't contain any relevant information for the fact-checking work, simply print one word in capital letters: "NONE".
* Keep your writing style like in the Examples 1, 2 and 3 provided to you.
* Try to filter out relevant information even if the search result is in a different language.

# Example 1
The search result from America Today provides several photographs of the Notre-Dame Cathedral fire on April 15, 2019. <image:i>, <image:j>, <image:k>. None of the images show the Eiffel Tower in the background. 

# Example 2
NONE

# Example 3
The Guardian discusses a report blaming the Syrian government for a toxic gas attack and condemning their use of chemical weapons. The Guardian mentions the Chemical Weapons Convention and the responsibilities of Syria under the convention. According to The Guardian, The White House condemned the Assad regime for defying the norm against chemical weapons use.

# Record
## Claim
Claim: "<image:50> This image shows Israel's 9/11 memorial which is the only one outside the US."

## Actions
```
geolocate(<image:50>)
web_search("Israel 9/11 memorial")
image_search("Israel 9/11 memorial")
```

# Search Result
From [Source](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/9/11_Living_Memorial_Plaza): 
Content: "[Jump to content](#bodyContent)

[Coordinates](/wiki/Geographic_coordinate_system "Geographic coordinate system")
: [31°48′24″N 35°10′44″E﻿ / ﻿31.80667°N 35.17889°E﻿ / 31.80667; 35.17889](https://geohack.toolforge.org/geohack.php?pagename=9/11_Living_Memorial_Plaza&params=31_48_24_N_35_10_44_E_region:IL_type:landmark)

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

Israeli monument in the Arazim Valley of Jerusalem

|     |     |
| --- | --- |9/11 Living Memorial Plaza
| [![](//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/d/d4/Twin_Towers_Memorial_in_Israel.jpg/250px-Twin_Towers_Memorial_in_Israel.jpg)](/wiki/File:Twin_Towers_Memorial_in_Israel.jpg)<br><br>Cenotaph of the complex: an [American flag](/wiki/Flag_of_the_United_States "Flag of the United States")<br> morphing into a [flame of remembrance](/wiki/Candlelight_vigil "Candlelight vigil") |     |
| [![Map](https://maps.wikimedia.org/img/osm-intl,13,31.806666666667,35.178888888889,250x200.png?lang=en&domain=en.wikipedia.org&title=9%2F11_Living_Memorial_Plaza&revid=1286276248&groups=_48a98e9381b706e57ffc5e7da39d009916ba0860)](/wiki/Special:Map/13/31.806666666667/35.178888888889/en) |     |
| Location | [West Jerusalem](/wiki/West_Jerusalem "West Jerusalem")<br>, Israel |
| Coordinates | [31°48′24″N 35°10′44″E﻿ / ﻿31.80667°N 35.17889°E﻿ / 31.80667; 35.17889](https://geohack.toolforge.org/geohack.php?pagename=9/11_Living_Memorial_Plaza&params=31_48_24_N_35_10_44_E_region:IL_type:landmark) |
| Designer | [Eliezer Weishoff](/wiki/Eliezer_Weishoff "Eliezer Weishoff") |
| Material | Granite, bronze, aluminum |
| Opening date | 12 November 2009 |
| Dedicated to | Victims of the [September 11 attacks](/wiki/September_11_attacks "September 11 attacks") |

The **9/11 Living Memorial Plaza** ([Hebrew](/wiki/Hebrew_language "Hebrew language")
: האנדרטה לזכר קרבנות אסון מגדלי התאומים) consists of an Israeli [cenotaph](/wiki/Cenotaph "Cenotaph")
 surrounded by a larger complex near [Ramot, Jerusalem](/wiki/Ramot,_East_Jerusalem "Ramot, East Jerusalem")
. It was built on 5 acres (2.0 ha) of land, having been completed in 2009, and had been designed by Israeli artist [Eliezer Weishoff](/wiki/Eliezer_Weishoff "Eliezer Weishoff")
 to honour the victims of the [September 11 attacks](/wiki/September_11_attacks "September 11 attacks")
, which were carried out by [al-Qaeda](/wiki/Al-Qaeda "Al-Qaeda")
 against the [United States](/wiki/United_States "United States")
 in 2001.

Construction
------------

\[[edit](/w/index.php?title=9/11_Living_Memorial_Plaza&action=edit&section=1 "Edit section: Construction")\
\]

[![The 9/11 Living Memorial Plaza Complex](//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/11/911MemorialEmekHaArazimSept202022_01.jpg/250px-911MemorialEmekHaArazimSept202022_01.jpg)](/wiki/File:911MemorialEmekHaArazimSept202022_01.jpg)

The 9/11 Living Memorial Plaza Complex

The cenotaph measures 30 feet and is made of granite, bronze, and aluminum. Cunningham")
, members of the Israeli Cabinet and legislature, the families of victims and others.[\[1\]](#cite_note-JPost-1)
[\[5\]](#cite_note-Haaretz-5)

Commemorations
--------------

\[[edit](/w/index.php?title=9/11_Living_Memorial_Plaza&action=edit&section=3 "Edit section: Commemorations")\
\]

The 2013 memorial for the 9/11 attacks was commemorated at Living Memorial Plaza. Shapiro")
 commented during the ceremony: "Here, at this painfully beautiful memorial site, we are a reminder to everyone that we, Americans and Israelis, stand together in a spirit of solidarity and commitment to the future."[\[1\]](#cite_note-JPost-1)

In Israeli society
------------------

\[[edit](/w/index.php?title=9/11_Living_Memorial_Plaza&action=edit&section=4 "Edit section: In Israeli society")\
\]

Israel has issued postage stamps with the 9/11 Living Memorial Plaza pictured, as a tribute to the World Trade Center victims. Also, Israel Coins and Medals Corp issues medal for 9/11 victims with the image of Living Memorial.[\[6\]](#cite_note-6)
[\[7\]](#cite_note-7)

Additional monuments
--------------------

\[[edit](/w/index.php?title=9/11_Living_Memorial_Plaza&action=edit&section=5 "Edit section: Additional monuments")\
\]

Following the 2018 [Pittsburgh synagogue shooting](/wiki/Pittsburgh_synagogue_shooting "Pittsburgh synagogue shooting")
, the Jewish National Fund and JNF-USA erected a stone plaque listing the names of the 11 victims of that attack next to the 9/11 Living Memorial Plaza. In February 2019, Pittsburgh mayor [Bill Peduto](/wiki/Bill_Peduto "Bill Peduto")
 visited the synagogue memorial and planted an olive tree beside it "as a symbol of peace and continuity".[\[8\]](#cite_note-8)

-------

# Your Summary



===== > RESPONSE:  < =====
The search result is from Wikipedia and describes the 9/11 Living Memorial Plaza in Jerusalem, Israel. <image:50> The memorial was completed in 2009 and designed by Eliezer Weishoff to honor the victims of the September 11 attacks. The cenotaph is made of granite, bronze, and aluminum. The article also includes several images of the memorial.

# Instructions
In order to find evidence that helps your fact-check, you just ran a web search which yielded a Search Result. **Your task right now is to summarize the Search Result.** What to include:
* information that might be useful for the fact-check (see Record)
* relevant images (refer to images by inserting their reference <image:k>)
* if available: the release date as well as the author or the publisher (e.g. the media company) of the search result.

Do NOT include:
* advertisements
* any other information not related to the Record or the Claim

Additional rules:
* Do not add any additional information besides the information in the Search Result.
* If the Search Result doesn't contain any relevant information for the fact-checking work, simply print one word in capital letters: "NONE".
* Keep your writing style like in the Examples 1, 2 and 3 provided to you.
* Try to filter out relevant information even if the search result is in a different language.

# Record
## Claim
Claim: "<image:50> This image shows Israel's 9/11 memorial which is the only one outside the US."

## Actions
```
geolocate(<image:50>)
web_search("Israel 9/11 memorial")
image_search("Israel 9/11 memorial")

# Search Result
From [Source](http://www.memorialmapping.com/memorials/9-11-living-memorial-plaza): 
Content: "[Memorial Mapping: Transnational 9/11 Memorials](/)

====================================================

[Memorial Mapping: Transnational 9/11 Memorials](/)

====================================================

9/11 Living Memorial Plaza
==========================

[Memorial Mapping: Transnational 9/11 Memorials](/)

====================================================

9/11 Living Memorial Plaza
==========================

!Jerusalem memorial 1.jpg <image:2231> !Jerusalem memorial 2.JPG <image:2232> !Jerusalem memorial 3.jpg <image:2233> !Jerusalem memorial 4.jpg <image:2234> !Jerusalem memorial 5.jpg <image:2235> !Jerusalem memorial 6.jpg <image:2236>

**Location:** Ramot, Jerusalem, [Israel](/memorials/browse-by-country/israel)

**Dedication Date:** November 12, 2009

**Creator:** Designed by Eliezer Weishoff, commissioned by Jewish National Fund

**Medium:** [Stone](/memorials/browse-by-medium/stone)
 (granite), [metal](/memorials/browse-by-medium/metal)
 ([WTC fragment](https://memorial-mapping.squarespace.com/memorials/browse-by-medium/wtc-fragments)
, bronze, aluminum)

**Description:** 30-foot high bronze sculture of waving American flag transforming into flame rests on granite base, part of which was taken from Twin Towers site, in round courtyard that can hold about 300 people for ceremonies. This metal piece, like the entire monument, is a manifestation of the special relationship between New York and Jerusalem and an expression of gratitude to Keren Kayemeth LeIsrael-Jewish National Fund whose initiative and the generous contribution of its supporters made this monument possible."

**Latitude & Longitude:** 31.806667, 35.178889

Image source: [Wikimedia Commons](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/9/11_Living_Memorial_Plaza)

[! It was sent over to Israel by the City of New York to be incorporated into this memorial. Located in contested territory (Arazim Valley, Ramot), on outskirts of Jerusalem. 

**Text:** "A reminder of shared loss and a call for peace among nations dedicated by Edward Blank, Sharon Cosloy Blank, Rebecca Blank, Michael Blank, May Cohn."

"This metal remnant was taken from the remains fo the Twin Towers that imploded in the September 11, 2001 disaster."

# Your Summary



===== > RESPONSE:  < =====
The search result is about the 9/11 Living Memorial Plaza in Jerusalem, Israel. It includes several images of the memorial <image:2231>, <image:2232>, <image:2233>, <image:2234>, <image:2235>, <image:2236>. The memorial was dedicated on November 12, 2009, and was designed by Eliezer Weishoff. It includes a 30-foot high bronze sculpture of a waving American flag transforming into a flame. A metal remnant from the Twin Towers is incorporated into the memorial.

# Search Result
From [Source](https://www.kkl-jnf.org/tourism-and-recreation/scenic-lookouts/center/twin-towers-living-memorial-jerusalem-park.aspx): 
Content: "  

[](/?catid=%7BE4819479-E363-4E8D-A5C6-82DFC827CC30%7D "Link to external site")

KKL-JNF Tourism Notifications
-----------------------------

[](https://www.kkl-jnf.org/tourism-and-recreation/messages/)

Additional info

Close Notifications

9/11 Living Memorial
====================

Click here to print

[](mailto:?Subject=KKL_New-9/11 Living Memorial&Body=https%3a%2f%2fwww.kkl-jnf.org%2ftourism-and-recreation%2fscenic-lookouts%2fcenter%2ftwin-towers-living-memorial-jerusalem-park.aspx "SHARE MAIL")

Click here to share

**Hebrew name:** Andartat HaTeomim  
  
**Location:** Jerusalem Park  
  
**Description:** An memorial established by KKL-JNF in the heart of Natua Forest, on top of a hill overlooking Ha’arazim Valley and Nahal Soreq. 
  
**Directions:** From Golda Meir Avenue in Jerusalem (Route 436), for those coming from the north, near the Golda Meir Interchange.

The 9/11 Twin Towers Living Memorial in Jerusalem Park. 
Memorial plaques on the wall around the plaza commemorate the nearly 3000 names of people who perished in the disaster, including five Israelis. 
Below the memorial is the Einot Telem National Park, featuring small springs that flow from the stone precipice, and the remains of the small Jewish settlement Beit Talma, which was built in 1906 and eventually abandoned. In the heart of this plaza, artist Eliezer Weishoff has installed a large 9-meter tall bronze sculpture."

# Your Summary



===== > RESPONSE:  < =====
The search result from KKL-JNF describes the 9/11 Twin Towers Living Memorial in Jerusalem Park. It mentions the memorial plaques with the names of the victims, including five Israelis. It also mentions the artist Eliezer Weishoff and his 9-meter tall bronze sculpture.

## Web Sources

From [Source](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/9/11_Living_Memorial_Plaza): 
Content: The search result is from Wikipedia and describes the 9/11 Living Memorial Plaza in Jerusalem, Israel. <image:50> The memorial was completed in 2009 and designed by Eliezer Weishoff to honor the victims of the September 11 attacks. It includes several images of the memorial <image:2231>, <image:2232>, <image:2233>, <image:2234>, <image:2235>, <image:2236>. From [Source](https://www.kkl-jnf.org/tourism-and-recreation/scenic-lookouts/center/twin-towers-living-memorial-jerusalem-park.aspx): 
Content: The search result from KKL-JNF describes the 9/11 Twin Towers Living Memorial in Jerusalem Park. It mentions the memorial plaques with the names of the victims, including five Israelis. It also mentions the artist Eliezer Weishoff and his 9-meter tall bronze sculpture.


## Your Summary



===== > RESPONSE:  < =====
The web sources describe the 9/11 Living Memorial Plaza in Jerusalem, Israel, which was completed in 2009. The memorial, designed by Eliezer Weishoff, features a bronze sculpture of a waving American flag transforming into a flame and includes a remnant from the Twin Towers. The memorial also has plaques with the names of the victims. <image:50> <image:2231> <image:2232> <image:2233> <image:2234> <image:2235> <image:2236>

The memorial is located in Jerusalem Park and honors the victims of the September 11 attacks, including five Israelis.

DevelopPrompt - QUERY:

# Instructions
You just retrieved new Evidence. Now, **analyze the Claim's veracity using the evidence**. Always adhere to the following rules:
* Focus on developing new insights. Do not repeat larger parts from the Record. Do not restate the Claim.
* Write down your thoughts step-by-step. Whenever necessary, you may elaborate in more detail.
* Depending on the topic's complexity, invest one to three paragraphs. The fewer, the better.
* If you find that there is insufficient information to verify the Claim, explicitly state what information is missing.
* If you cite web sources, always refer to them by including their URL as a Markdown hyperlink.
* **Use information only from the recorded evidence**: Avoid inserting information that is not implied by the evidence. You may use commonsense knowledge, though.

# Record
## Claim
Claim: "<image:50> This image shows Israel's 9/11 memorial which is the only one outside the US."

## Actions
```
geolocate(<image:50>)
web_search("Israel 9/11 memorial")
image_search("Israel 9/11 memorial")
```

## Evidence
### Evidence from `geolocate`
The most likely countries where the image was taken are: {'Israel': 0.63, 'Palestine': 0.26, 'Jordan': 0.05, 'United States': 0.05, 'Albania': 0.0, 'Andorra': 0.0, 'Argentina': 0.0, 'Australia': 0.0, 'Austria': 0.0, 'Bangladesh': 0.0}

### Evidence from `web_search`
The web sources describe the 9/11 Living Memorial Plaza in Jerusalem, Israel, which was completed in 2009. The memorial, designed by Eliezer Weishoff, features a bronze sculpture of a waving American flag transforming into a flame and includes a remnant from the Twin Towers. The memorial also has plaques with the names of the victims. <image:50> <image:2231> <image:2232> <image:2233> <image:2234> <image:2235> <image:2236>

The memorial is located in Jerusalem Park and honors the victims of the September 11 attacks, including five Israelis.


# Your Analysis



===== > RESPONSE:  < =====
The evidence confirms that the image depicts the 9/11 Living Memorial in Jerusalem, Israel. The memorial is dedicated to the victims of the September 11 attacks. However, the evidence does not explicitly state whether this is the only 9/11 memorial outside the US.

To verify the claim, it is necessary to determine if there are other 9/11 memorials located outside of the United States.

_________________________



JudgePrompt - QUERY:

# Instructions
**Determine the Claim's veracity** by following these steps:
1. Briefly summarize the key insights from the fact-check (see Record) in at most one paragraph.
2. Write one paragraph about which one of the Decision Options applies best. Include the most appropriate decision option at the end and enclose it in backticks like `this`.




## Decision Options
* `not enough information`: The fact-check does not contain sufficient information to come to an conclusion. For example,there is substantial lack of evidence or the evidence is inconclusive, conflicting or self-contradictory. In the case of a lack of evidence, state which information exactly is missing. In particular, if no RESULTS or sources are available, pick this decision.
* `false`: The claim is not factually accurate. This is the case if one of the following three conditions is met:(1) The claim is demonstrably false when it is disproven by evidence from multiple and reliable sources,(2) The claim or image is taken out of context, i.e. the origin, content and/or meaning of a statement or an image is misrepresented. For example, an old claim or an old image is mispresented in a new context in a misleading way,(3) There is not enough evidence to verify the claim or the evidence is conflicting or self-contradictory.
* `true`: The claim is factually accurate when it is confirmed by evidence from multiple and reliable sources.

# Record
## Claim
Claim: "<image:50> This image shows Israel's 9/11 memorial which is the only one outside the US."

## Actions
```
geolocate(<image:50>)
web_search("Israel 9/11 memorial")
image_search("Israel 9/11 memorial")
```

## Evidence

### Evidence from `web_search`
The web sources describe the 9/11 Living Memorial Plaza in Jerusalem, Israel, which was completed in 2009. The memorial, designed by Eliezer Weishoff, features a bronze sculpture of a waving American flag transforming into a flame and includes a remnant from the Twin Towers. The memorial also has plaques with the names of the victims. <image:50> <image:2231> <image:2232> <image:2233> <image:2234> <image:2235> <image:2236>

The memorial is located in Jerusalem Park and honors the victims of the September 11 attacks, including five Israelis.


## Elaboration
The evidence confirms that the image depicts the 9/11 Living Memorial in Jerusalem, Israel. The memorial is dedicated to the victims of the September 11 attacks. However, the evidence does not explicitly state whether this is the only 9/11 memorial outside the US.

To verify the claim, it is necessary to determine if there are other 9/11 memorials located outside of the United States.


# Your Judgement



===== > RESPONSE:  < =====
The image shows the 9/11 Living Memorial in Jerusalem, Israel. The memorial is dedicated to the victims of the September 11 attacks. However, the evidence does not explicitly state whether this is the only 9/11 memorial outside the US.

`not enough information`

PlanPrompt - QUERY:

# Instructions
The available knowledge is insufficient to assess the Claim. Therefore, **propose a set of actions** to retrieve new and helpful evidence. Adhere to the following rules:
* The actions available are listed under Valid Actions, including a short description for each action. No other actions are possible at this moment. 
* For each action, use the formatting as specified in Valid Actions.
* Include all actions in a single Markdown code block at the end of your answer.
* Propose as few actions as possible, but as much as needed. Do not propose similar or previously used actions.



## Valid Actions
* `web_search`
   * Description: Run an open web search on Google or DuckDuckGO to retrieve any related webpage.
   * How to use: Do not use this with a previously used or similar query from previous web searches. If a previous web search did not yield any results, use a very different query.
   * Format: web_search("your web search query goes here")

* `image_search`
   * Description: Run an image search on Google to retrieve related images for a given query.
   * How to use: This is a helpful tool for fact-checking images. Use this to retrieve images associated with a specific keyword or phrase. Ensure that the query is clear and specific to improve search accuracy. If no relevant images are found, refine the query or use more descriptive terms.
   * Format: image_search("your image search query goes here")

# Example: web_search()

## Claim
Text: "New Zealand’s new Food Bill bans gardening"
Claim date: October 29, 2020

...

## Actions
```
web_search("New Zealand Food Bill 2020")
web_search("New Zealand Food Bill gardening ban")
```

# Example: image_search()

## Claim
Text: "Chinese officials in white protective hazmat suits carried people down a hallway to be quarantined for having COVID-19 in November 2022."

...

ACTIONS:
```
image_search("China officials white suits carry people")
image_search("China officials carry people COVID quarantine 2022")
```

# Record
## Claim

## Actions

```

## Evidence
### Evidence from `geolocate`
The most likely countries where the image was taken are: {'Israel': 0.63, 'Palestine': 0.26, 'Jordan': 0.05, 'United States': 0.05, 'Albania': 0.0, 'Andorra': 0.0, 'Argentina': 0.0, 'Australia': 0.0, 'Austria': 0.0, 'Bangladesh': 0.0}

### Evidence from `web_search`
The web sources describe the 9/11 Living Memorial Plaza in Jerusalem, Israel, which was completed in 2009. The memorial, designed by Eliezer Weishoff, features a bronze sculpture of a waving American flag transforming into a flame and includes a remnant from the Twin Towers. The memorial also has plaques with the names of the victims. <image:50> <image:2231> <image:2232> <image:2233> <image:2234> <image:2235> <image:2236>

The memorial is located in Jerusalem Park and honors the victims of the September 11 attacks, including five Israelis.


## Elaboration
The evidence confirms that the image depicts the 9/11 Living Memorial in Jerusalem, Israel. The memorial is dedicated to the victims of the September 11 attacks. However, the evidence does not explicitly state whether this is the only 9/11 memorial outside the US.

To verify the claim, it is necessary to determine if there are other 9/11 memorials located outside of the United States.


# Your Actions



===== > RESPONSE:  < =====
```
web_search("9/11 memorials outside the US")
```

SummarizeResultPrompt - QUERY:

# Instructions
In order to find evidence that helps your fact-check, you just ran a web search which yielded a Search Result. **Your task right now is to summarize the Search Result.** What to include:
* information that might be useful for the fact-check (see Record)
* relevant images (refer to images by inserting their reference <image:k>)
* if available: the release date as well as the author or the publisher (e.g. the media company) of the search result.

Do NOT include:
* advertisements
* any other information not related to the Record or the Claim

Additional rules:
* Do not add any additional information besides the information in the Search Result.
* If the Search Result doesn't contain any relevant information for the fact-checking work, simply print one word in capital letters: "NONE".
* Keep your writing style like in the Examples 1, 2 and 3 provided to you.
* Try to filter out relevant information even if the search result is in a different language.

# Example 1
The search result from America Today provides several photographs of the Notre-Dame Cathedral fire on April 15, 2019. <image:i>, <image:j>, <image:k>. None of the images show the Eiffel Tower in the background. 

# Example 2
NONE

# Example 3
The Guardian discusses a report blaming the Syrian government for a toxic gas attack and condemning their use of chemical weapons. The Guardian mentions the Chemical Weapons Convention and the responsibilities of Syria under the convention. According to The Guardian, The White House condemned the Assad regime for defying the norm against chemical weapons use.

# Search Result
From [Source](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Memorials_and_services_for_the_September_11_attacks): 
Content: "The memorial composed a section of steel I-beam from one of the towers of the World Trade Center and on the base holding the steel beam has 4 plaques remembering the victims of 9/11[\[70\]](#cite_note-70)
    
*   On September 11, 2013, [Bremerton, Washington](/wiki/Bremerton,_Washington "Bremerton, Washington")
    , dedicated the Central Kitsap 9/11 Memorial at Evergreen Park, including steel girders from the World Trade Center, limestone from the Pentagon, and sand from the Shanksville, Pennsylvania crash site[\[71\]](#cite_note-71)
    
*   Outside the [Air Mobility Command Museum](/wiki/Air_Mobility_Command_Museum "Air Mobility Command Museum")
     building near [Dover, Delaware](/wiki/Dover,_Delaware "Dover, Delaware")
    , there is a 9/11 memorial consisting of two pieces of steel from the North Tower, a rock from the United Airlines Flight 93 crash site, and a block from the Pentagon. Proceeds from the concerts went to families of firemen killed in the attacks.
*   October 21, _[United We Stand: What More Can I Give](/wiki/United_We_Stand:_What_More_Can_I_Give "United We Stand: What More Can I Give")
    _
*   December 9, _Hispanos Unidos Por New York_ (_Hispanics United For New York_), a [Latin music](/wiki/Latin_music "Latin music")
     concert held by the [Spanish Broadcasting System](/wiki/Spanish_Broadcasting_System "Spanish Broadcasting System")
     at the [Madison Square Garden](/wiki/Madison_Square_Garden "Madison Square Garden")
    , for both the victims of the September 11 attacks and the crash of [American Airlines Flight 587](/wiki/American_Airlines_Flight_587 "American Airlines Flight 587")
    .[\[92\]](#cite_note-92)
    

### 2002 and later events

\[[edit](/w/index.php?title=Memorials_and_services_for_the_September_11_attacks&action=edit&section=9 "Edit section: 2002 and later events")\
\]

On February 3, 2002, during the halftime show of [Super Bowl XXXVI](/wiki/Super_Bowl_XXXVI "Super Bowl XXXVI")
, rock group [U2](/wiki/U2 "U2")
 performed" [Where the Streets Have No Name](/wiki/Where_the_Streets_Have_No_Name "Where the Streets Have No Name")
", while the names of the victims were projected onto banners. The memorial is dedicated to the five individuals at the Pentagon whose remains were never found, and the partial remains of another 25 victims are buried beneath the memorial.[\[95\]](#cite_note-Cass-95)
 The names of the 184 victims of the Pentagon attack are inscribed on the memorial's side.

On September 11, 2002, the documentary play _[Bystander 9/11](/wiki/Bystander_9/11 "Bystander 9/11")
_ was performed at [Church of the Transfiguration, Episcopal (Manhattan)](/wiki/Church_of_the_Transfiguration,_Episcopal_(Manhattan) "Church of the Transfiguration, Episcopal (Manhattan)")
, the play has since been published and has been regularly performed on the anniversary of the event, with numerous performances around the United States on the 20th anniversary.

A 9/11 memorial public sculpture by Ingrid Lahti was on display at [Bellevue Downtown Park](/wiki/Bellevue_Downtown_Park "Bellevue Downtown Park")
, [Bellevue, Washington](/wiki/Bellevue,_Washington "Bellevue, Washington")
; it was installed September 11, 2002 and displayed through October.[\[96\]](#cite_note-96)
[\[97\]](#cite_note-97)

10th anniversary memorial services
----------------------------------

\[[edit](/w/index.php?title=Memorials_and_services_for_the_September_11_attacks&action=edit&section=10 "Edit section: 10th anniversary memorial services")\
\]

Many organizations held memorial services and events for the 10th anniversary of the attacks.

*   The official New York City observance of the 10th anniversary of September 11 took place at the World Trade Center site at 8:40 am – 12:30 pm Sunday, September 11, 2011. Hundreds of citizens assembled during the remembrance ceremony held for the Tenth Anniversary on Sunday, September 11.

20th anniversary memorial services
----------------------------------

\[[edit](/w/index.php?title=Memorials_and_services_for_the_September_11_attacks&action=edit&section=11 "Edit section: 20th anniversary memorial services")\
\]

The 20th anniversary came just weeks after a hastened [withdrawal of United States troops from Afghanistan](/wiki/Withdrawal_of_United_States_troops_from_Afghanistan_(2020%E2%80%932021) "Withdrawal of United States troops from Afghanistan (2020–2021)")
 following the [2021 Taliban offensive](/wiki/2021_Taliban_offensive "2021 Taliban offensive")
 in which the [Taliban](/wiki/Taliban "Taliban")
 reconquered most of Afghanistan. We have built this memorial because, to be blunt, the world needed it done years ago, and the two years longer to await the completion of the _Reflected Absence_ memorial in New York city (by Michael Arad and Peter Walker) was in our opinion two years too long.[\[118\]](#cite_note-sl-crnyc-ann-118)

*   World Trade Center Memorial (_Second Life_)[\[119\]](#cite_note-sl-wtcm-119)
     is focused on the victims of 9/11, reminiscent of the Memorial Wall of the [Vietnam Veterans Memorial](/wiki/Vietnam_Veterans_Memorial "Vietnam Veterans Memorial")
    .

External links

\[[edit](/w/index.php?title=Memorials_and_services_for_the_September_11_attacks&action=edit&section=19 "Edit section: External links")\
\]

[![](//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/4a/Commons-logo.svg/40px-Commons-logo.svg.png)](/wiki/File:Commons-logo.svg)

Wikimedia Commons has media related to [Monuments and memorials to the September 11 attacks](https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Category:Monuments_and_memorials_to_the_September_11_attacks "commons:Category:Monuments and memorials to the September 11 attacks")
.

*   [Project 2,996](http://project2996.com/blog/)
     [Archived](https://web.archive.org/web/20071213054840/http://project2996.com/blog/)
     December 13, 2007, at the [Wayback Machine](/wiki/Wayback_Machine "Wayback Machine")
     – A grassroots effort by bloggers to remember the victims on the 5th anniversary of the attacks
*   [September 11 Memorial Tattoos in the Staten Island Historical Society Online Collections Database](https://statenisland.pastperfectonline.com/search?utf8=%E2%9C%93&search_criteria=%22indelible+memories%22&searchButton=Search)
    
*   [9/11 Museum Design Unveiled](https://web.archive.org/web/20080930034000/http://cityroom.blogs.nytimes.com/2008/09/09/new-911-museum-design-is-unveiled/index.html?hp)
    \-_New York Times_ article addressing 2012 Memorial Museum Complex
*   [National September 11 Memorial & Museum](http://national911memorial.org)
    \- permanent Memorial and Museum at the World Trade Center site
*   [9-11 Garden of Reflection](http://www.9-11memorialgarden.org)
    
*   [NYC Memorials and Monuments](http://www.yellowecho.com/site/tag/911-tribute/)
     – A growing collection of photographs of NYC 9/11 memorials and monuments
*   [9/11 Living Memorial Plaza dedication ceremony](http://www.jnf.org/work-we-do/our-projects/tourism-recreation/911-living-memorial-in.html?/)
     [Archived](https://web.archive.org/web/20160304053819/http://www.jnf.org/work-we-do/our-projects/tourism-recreation/911-living-memorial-in.html?/)
     March 4, 2016, at the [Wayback Machine](/wiki/Wayback_Machine "Wayback Machine")
     – Video and information about the [9/11 Living Memorial Plaza](/wiki/9/11_Living_Memorial_Plaza "9/11 Living Memorial Plaza")
     dedication ceremony in Jerusalem, on November 12, 2009.

# Your Summary



===== > RESPONSE:  < =====
The Wikipedia article "Memorials and services for the September 11 attacks" lists several 9/11 memorials, including the 9/11 Living Memorial Plaza in Jerusalem, Israel. The article also mentions other memorials located in the US and one at Bagram Airfield, Afghanistan. The article was last edited on October 2, 2023.

_________________________



SummarizeResultPrompt - QUERY:

# Instructions
In order to find evidence that helps your fact-check, you just ran a web search which yielded a Search Result. **Your task right now is to summarize the Search Result.** What to include:
* information that might be useful for the fact-check (see Record)
* relevant images (refer to images by inserting their reference <image:k>)
* if available: the release date as well as the author or the publisher (e.g. the media company) of the search result.

Do NOT include:
* advertisements
* any other information not related to the Record or the Claim

Additional rules:
* Do not add any additional information besides the information in the Search Result.
* If the Search Result doesn't contain any relevant information for the fact-checking work, simply print one word in capital letters: "NONE".
* Keep your writing style like in the Examples 1, 2 and 3 provided to you.
* Try to filter out relevant information even if the search result is in a different language.

# Example 1
The search result from America Today provides several photographs of the Notre-Dame Cathedral fire on April 15, 2019. <image:i>, <image:j>, <image:k>. None of the images show the Eiffel Tower in the background. 

# Example 2
NONE

# Example 3
The Guardian discusses a report blaming the Syrian government for a toxic gas attack and condemning their use of chemical weapons. The Guardian mentions the Chemical Weapons Convention and the responsibilities of Syria under the convention. According to The Guardian, The White House condemned the Assad regime for defying the norm against chemical weapons use.

# Record
## Claim
Claim: "<image:50> This image shows Israel's 9/11 memorial which is the only one outside the US."

## Actions
```
geolocate(<image:50>)
web_search("Israel 9/11 memorial")
image_search("Israel 9/11 memorial")
```

## Evidence
### Evidence from `geolocate`
The most likely countries where the image was taken are: {'Israel': 0.63, 'Palestine': 0.26, 'Jordan': 0.05, 'United States': 0.05, 'Albania': 0.0, 'Andorra': 0.0, 'Argentina': 0.0, 'Australia': 0.0, 'Austria': 0.0, 'Bangladesh': 0.0}

### Evidence from `web_search`
The web sources describe the 9/11 Living Memorial Plaza in Jerusalem, Israel, which was completed in 2009. The memorial, designed by Eliezer Weishoff, features a bronze sculpture of a waving American flag transforming into a flame and includes a remnant from the Twin Towers. The memorial also has plaques with the names of the victims. <image:50> <image:2231> <image:2232> <image:2233> <image:2234> <image:2235> <image:2236>

The memorial is located in Jerusalem Park and honors the victims of the September 11 attacks, including five Israelis.


## Elaboration
The evidence confirms that the image depicts the 9/11 Living Memorial in Jerusalem, Israel. The memorial is dedicated to the victims of the September 11 attacks. However, the evidence does not explicitly state whether this is the only 9/11 memorial outside the US.

To verify the claim, it is necessary to determine if there are other 9/11 memorials located outside of the United States.


## Actions
```
web_search("9/11 memorials outside the US")
```

# Search Result
From [Source](http://www.memorialmapping.com/memorials/browse-by-country): 
Content: "[Memorial Mapping: Transnational 9/11 Memorials](/)

====================================================

[Memorial Mapping: Transnational 9/11 Memorials](/)

====================================================

Browse By Country
=================

[Memorial Mapping: Transnational 9/11 Memorials](/)

====================================================

**Browse By Country**
=====================

Victims of the 9/11 terrorist attacks came from [ninety-two countries.](/casualties-by-country)
 The list below includes the countries other than the United States that have made 9/11 memorials. Click on the individual country name for more information (the number in parentheses beside the country name shows the number of memorials in that country. If you know of other memorials that we have not included, please **[contact us.](/contact-us)**

**Country List:**

**[Afghanistan](/memorials/browse-by-country/afghanistan)

# Instructions
You just retrieved web sources, each one summarized under "Web Sources". **Your task right now is to summarize the web source summaries.**

# Record
## Claim
Claim: "<image:50> This image shows Israel's 9/11 memorial which is the only one outside the US."

## Actions
```
geolocate(<image:50>)
web_search("Israel 9/11 memorial")
image_search("Israel 9/11 memorial")
```

## Evidence
### Evidence from `geolocate`
The most likely countries where the image was taken are: {'Israel': 0.63, 'Palestine': 0.26, 'Jordan': 0.05, 'United States': 0.05, 'Albania': 0.0, 'Andorra': 0.0, 'Argentina': 0.0, 'Australia': 0.0, 'Austria': 0.0, 'Bangladesh': 0.0}

### Evidence from `web_search`
The web sources describe the 9/11 Living Memorial Plaza in Jerusalem, Israel, which was completed in 2009. The memorial, designed by Eliezer Weishoff, features a bronze sculpture of a waving American flag transforming into a flame and includes a remnant from the Twin Towers. The memorial also has plaques with the names of the victims. <image:50> <image:2231> <image:2232> <image:2233> <image:2234> <image:2235> <image:2236>

The memorial is located in Jerusalem Park and honors the victims of the September 11 attacks, including five Israelis.


## Elaboration
The evidence confirms that the image depicts the 9/11 Living Memorial in Jerusalem, Israel. The memorial is dedicated to the victims of the September 11 attacks. However, the evidence does not explicitly state whether this is the only 9/11 memorial outside the US.

To verify the claim, it is necessary to determine if there are other 9/11 memorials located outside of the United States.


## Actions
```
web_search("9/11 memorials outside the US")
```

## Web Sources
**Web Search Result**

From [Source](https://voicescenter.org/living-memorial/memorials/by-country): 
Content: The search result from voicescenter.org lists numerous 9/11 memorials outside the US, including memorials in Australia, Canada, China, France, Iceland, India, Ireland, Israel, Italy, Poland, Puerto Rico, South Korea, Spain, Ukraine, and the United Kingdom.


From [Source](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Memorials_and_services_for_the_September_11_attacks): 
Content: The Wikipedia article "Memorials and services for the September 11 attacks" lists several 9/11 memorials, including the 9/11 Living Memorial Plaza in Jerusalem, Israel. The article also mentions other memorials located in the US and one at Bagram Airfield, Afghanistan. The article was last edited on October 2, 2023.


From [Source](http://www.memorialmapping.com/memorials/browse-by-country): 
Content: The search result from Memorial Mapping lists several countries with 9/11 memorials, including Afghanistan, Australia, Canada, Ireland, Israel, and the United Kingdom. <image:10659>


## Your Summary



===== > RESPONSE:  < =====
The web sources indicate that there are multiple 9/11 memorials located outside of the United States. These memorials are located in countries such as Australia, Canada, China, France, Ireland, Israel, and the United Kingdom, among others. The 9/11 Living Memorial Plaza in Jerusalem, Israel, is one such memorial. <image:10659>

JudgePrompt - QUERY:

# Instructions
**Determine the Claim's veracity** by following these steps:
1. Briefly summarize the key insights from the fact-check (see Record) in at most one paragraph.
2. Write one paragraph about which one of the Decision Options applies best. Include the most appropriate decision option at the end and enclose it in backticks like `this`.




## Decision Options
* `not enough information`: The fact-check does not contain sufficient information to come to an conclusion. For example,there is substantial lack of evidence or the evidence is inconclusive, conflicting or self-contradictory. In the case of a lack of evidence, state which information exactly is missing. In particular, if no RESULTS or sources are available, pick this decision.
* `false`: The claim is not factually accurate. This is the case if one of the following three conditions is met:(1) The claim is demonstrably false when it is disproven by evidence from multiple and reliable sources,(2) The claim or image is taken out of context, i.e. the origin, content and/or meaning of a statement or an image is misrepresented. For example, an old claim or an old image is mispresented in a new context in a misleading way,(3) There is not enough evidence to verify the claim or the evidence is conflicting or self-contradictory.
* `true`: The claim is factually accurate when it is confirmed by evidence from multiple and reliable sources.

SummarizeDocPrompt - QUERY:

# Instructions
You are provided with the record of a fact-check. It contains the Claim to be verified and a documentation of all the fact-checking work along the gathered evidence. Your task is to **summarize the fact-check**. That is, you provide a concise, one-paragraph justification for the final VERDICT based on the knowledge from the Record. Note:
* Be truthful, brief, do not add any additional information besides the information given in the Record. 
* Link key sources in your summary. Use Markdown notation for that. You may link them in-line.
* Don't state the Claim again. Rather focus on the key insights of the fact-check.
* Simply print just the summary.

# Record
## Claim
Claim: "<image:50> This image shows Israel's 9/11 memorial which is the only one outside the US."

## Actions
```
geolocate(<image:50>)
web_search("Israel 9/11 memorial")
image_search("Israel 9/11 memorial")
```

## Evidence
### Evidence from `geolocate`
The most likely countries where the image was taken are: {'Israel': 0.63, 'Palestine': 0.26, 'Jordan': 0.05, 'United States': 0.05, 'Albania': 0.0, 'Andorra': 0.0, 'Argentina': 0.0, 'Australia': 0.0, 'Austria': 0.0, 'Bangladesh': 0.0}

### Evidence from `web_search`
The web sources describe the 9/11 Living Memorial Plaza in Jerusalem, Israel, which was completed in 2009. The memorial, designed by Eliezer Weishoff, features a bronze sculpture of a waving American flag transforming into a flame and includes a remnant from the Twin Towers. The memorial also has plaques with the names of the victims. <image:50> <image:2231> <image:2232> <image:2233> <image:2234> <image:2235> <image:2236>

The memorial is located in Jerusalem Park and honors the victims of the September 11 attacks, including five Israelis.


## Elaboration

To verify the claim, it is necessary to determine if there are other 9/11 memorials located outside of the United States.


## Actions
```
web_search("9/11 memorials outside the US")
```

## Evidence
### Evidence from `web_search`
The web sources indicate that there are multiple 9/11 memorials located outside of the United States. These memorials are located in countries such as Australia, Canada, China, France, Ireland, Israel, and the United Kingdom, among others. The 9/11 Living Memorial Plaza in Jerusalem, Israel, is one such memorial. <image:10659>


## Elaboration
The claim is false. The evidence shows that the image depicts the 9/11 Living Memorial in Jerusalem, Israel. However, there are multiple 9/11 memorials located outside of the United States, not just the one in Israel.


## Final Judgement
The image shows the 9/11 Living Memorial in Jerusalem, Israel. While the memorial exists, the claim that it is the only 9/11 memorial outside the US is false, as there are multiple such memorials worldwide. `false`

## Summary



===== > RESPONSE:  < =====
The claim is false. The image depicts the 9/11 Living Memorial in Jerusalem, Israel, which is a memorial outside the US. However, contrary to the claim, there are multiple 9/11 memorials located outside the United States, as evidenced by [web search results](https://www.google.com/search?q=9%2F11+memorials+outside+the+US).

PlanPrompt - QUERY:

# Instructions
The available knowledge is insufficient to assess the Claim. Therefore, **propose a set of actions** to retrieve new and helpful evidence. Adhere to the following rules:
* The actions available are listed under Valid Actions, including a short description for each action. No other actions are possible at this moment. 
* For each action, use the formatting as specified in Valid Actions.
* Include all actions in a single Markdown code block at the end of your answer.
* Propose as few actions as possible, but as much as needed. Do not propose similar or previously used actions.



## Valid Actions
* `geolocate`
   * Description: Performs geolocation to determine the country where an image was taken.
   * How to use: Provide an image and the model will determine the most likely countries where it was taken.
   * Format: geolocate(<image:k>), where `k` is the image's ID

* `web_search`
   * Description: Run an open web search on Google or DuckDuckGO to retrieve any related webpage.
   * How to use: Do not use this with a previously used or similar query from previous web searches. If a previous web search did not yield any results, use a very different query.
   * Format: web_search("your web search query goes here")

* `image_search`
   * Description: Run an image search on Google to retrieve related images for a given query.
   * How to use: This is a helpful tool for fact-checking images. Use this to retrieve images associated with a specific keyword or phrase. Ensure that the query is clear and specific to improve search accuracy. If no relevant images are found, refine the query or use more descriptive terms.
   * Format: image_search("your image search query goes here")

# Example: geolocate()

## Claim
Text: "<image:k> shows a nuclear weapons facility in Usbekistan."

...

## Actions
```
geolocate(<image:k>)
```

# Example: web_search()

## Claim

Claim date: October 29, 2020

...

## Actions
```

web_search("New Zealand Food Bill gardening ban")
```

# Example: image_search()

...

```

```
